text: Shrimad Vidyadhiraj Teerth ( 3 August 1945 â€“ 19 July 2021), was a Hindu philosopher & 23rd peethadhish of Gokarna math. He was the Mathadipathi of the Partagali Gokarna math of Goa from 26th Feb 1967 to 19 July 2021. ==References== Category:1945 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Indian philosophers Category:20th-century philosophers Category:21st-century philosophers Category:People from Karnataka
title: Shrimad Vidyadhiraj Teerth Swamiji
